nav.div: Woodhaven-Brownstown School District » Departments » Superintendent » COVID-19 Information

strong.span: Administration Offices and Board of Education

strong.br:
WBSD District Nurse, Jennifer Woodworth, can be reached at:
woodwoj@wbsdweb.com with questions or concerns regarding COVID-19.
AS A SAFETY PRECAUTION, THE CDC RECOMMENDS
A DISTANCE OF 6 FT. WHEN PRACTICING SOCIAL DISTANCING.
To request a Chromebook visit and fill out Chromebook Request Form on the left.

strong.span:
Please visit the links on the left for more information.
Thank you
